## Transport.send() method

Sends a message. Resolves once message is sent. Otherwise rejects with an Error.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
send(message: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  message | <code>string</code> | Message to send. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`
